snippet: The text of an e-mail from a Manhattan synagogue’s rabbis to congregants to clarify an earlier e-mail on the U.N.’s decision to upgrade Palestine to observer state status.
lead_paragraph: The text of an e-mail from a Manhattan synagogue’s rabbis to congregants to clarify an earlier e-mail on the U.N.’s decision to upgrade Palestine to observer state status.

headline.seo: Second B’nai Jeshurun Leadership E-mail on Palestine
headline.main: Second B’nai Jeshurun Leadership E-mail on Palestine
